name: Earth Defender (V2)
description:
Earth is under attack! It's not aliens, it's a meteor shower! NASA has prepared for this! Use NASA space shields to defend the earth. The shields can break so keep them repaired using the fusion cells NASA launches up!

This game does not focus on Up and Down motion, but rather rotational motion as the shields zoom around the earth!

This game was inspired by Vimlark's Ludum Dare Game Jam "Hard Mode" game.
